    • Method Detail

      • makePurchase

        public void makePurchase(Product product)
                  throws PurchaseAmountExceededException,
                         BadPurchaseException
        Description copied from interface: Customer
        Use this method on a Customer to have the Customer purchase a Product that was created using the Product class.
        Parameters:
        product - A reference to a Product object
        Throws:
        PurchaseAmountExceededException - - This Exception is thrown if the cost of the Product exceeds the Customer balance.
        BadPurchaseException - - This Exception is thrown if there was a problem with the Product.
